title: Down and out
creator_credit: Gilbert Altschul Productions and Journal Films
brief_description: The film depicts one of the most common causes of injury in workshop situations - falling. It examines the common hazards which cause people to lose their balance; over-reaching, taking short cuts, failure to check eqiupment, and not looking where one is going.
